import React from 'react' import { FormInstance } from 'antd/lib/form' import { Alert, Col, DatePicker, Form, Input, Row, Switch } from 'antd' import AccountsInput from 'Components/Inputs/Financial/Accounts/AccountsInput' import FinanceCategory from 'Components/Inputs/FinanceCategory/FinanceCategory' import ProcessInput from 'Components/Inputs/ProcessInput/ProcessInput' import PersonInput from 'Components/Inputs/PersonInput/PersonInput' import MovementInput from 'Components/Inputs/Movements/Movements' import CurrencyInput from 'Components/Inputs/CurrencyInput' import moment from 'moment' type Props = { form: FormInstance, is_paid: boolean, handleChangeReverse: () => void afterSave?: () => void } const initial_values = { _id: null, isPaid: false, expirationDate: moment(), movement_id: null, category_id: null, financialAccount_id: null, value: 0, discount: 0, observation: '' } const FinancialForm: React.FC = ({ form, is_paid, afterSave, handleChangeReverse }) => { const handleChangeIsPaid = (value: boolean) => { if (is_paid && !value) handleChangeReverse() } return (
{is_paid && ( )}
{({ getFieldValue }) => { const form_is_paid = getFieldValue('isPaid') if (is_paid) { return {form_is_paid ? 'Estornar Movimentação' : 'Marcar movimentação como paga'} } return {form_is_paid ? 'Movimentação paga' : 'Marcar movimentação como paga'} }}
) } export default FinancialForm
